challenges.name: Retro Rainbow
challenges.description: Climb to the top of the HALEIWA rainbow bridge in freedrive

challenges.description: Drive from the MOKAPU surf shop to the KAHALUU BEACH natural arch in less than 2min

challenges.name: Retro Leader
challenges.description: Drive 2km straight in 1ST position in the event STAYIN' AHEAD

challenges.description: Win the event vintage Showdown with the nitro switched off

challenges.name: Retro Top Driver
challenges.description: Reach the top 15 in a GRAND RACE

challenges.description: Finish the event STOCK AROUND THE CLOCK without collision

challenges.name: Retro Caretaker
challenges.description: Finish the event BACK IN TIME without collision

challenges.name: Retro Wrestler
challenges.description: Collide 10 times with your opponents driving a demolition car in the event STOCK AROUND THE CLOCK

challenges.name: Retro Stroll
challenges.description: Finish the event MUSTANG SALLY in less than 3:15min

challenges.name: Retro Mudracer
challenges.description: Drive 1000m on dirt roads above 175km/h in the event GET DIRT ON IT

challenges.description: Drive for 8min in freedrive by night

challenges.name: Retro Speedster
challenges.description: Drive for 5sec straight above 250km/h without using nitro

challenges.name: Retro Level
challenges.description: Win any event with the max Perf Level

challenges.name: Retro Nitro
challenges.description: Empty your entire nitro gauge at least 3 times in the event KISS ME KOMBI

challenges.description: Drive for 10min

challenges.name: Retro Spicing Up
challenges.description: Win 2 events without using nitro while driving a CLASSIC vehicle

challenges.name: Retro Machine
challenges.description: Win 3 events without ABS while driving a CLASSIC vehicle

challenges.name: Retro Gang Spirit
challenges.description: Drive 5km in a Crew Formation with a least 2 CLASSIC vehicle

challenges.name: Retro Expert
challenges.description: Equip a visual part on 3 vehicles

challenges.name: Retro Texas
challenges.description: Find all the Retro Gas Pump collectibles located near gas stations
